entity.description: Code review process and quality gates for DOTS Family Mode ensuring security, performance, and maintainability through systematic review procedures

requirements.description: All code handling sensitive data must be reviewed for security vulnerabilities, cryptographic operations must follow established patterns, input validation and sanitization reviewed, privilege escalation risks assessed, and memory safety verified (unsafe blocks require justification)
requirements.title: Security Review Checklist

requirements.description: Changes must align with existing architectural patterns, maintain separation of concerns between crates, follow established async/tokio patterns, DBus interface changes require extra scrutiny, and database schema changes must have migration strategy
requirements.title: Architecture & Design Review

requirements.description: All new code must include appropriate tests, CI checks must pass (clippy, tests, formatting), code coverage must not decrease significantly, eBPF changes require kernel compatibility validation, and performance impact assessed for critical paths
requirements.title: Testing & Quality Gates

requirements.description: Code changes must include updated documentation, public API changes require rustdoc updates, complex logic requires inline comments explaining rationale, commit messages must reference Engram tasks, and breaking changes must be clearly communicated
requirements.title: Documentation & Communication

entity.title: Code Review Standards
